effect.shortEffect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.
effect.full: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment when it is switched out for another Pokémon. If this ability is acquired during battle, the Pokémon is cured upon leaving battle before losing the temporary ability.

description.diamond-pearl: All status problems are healed upon switching out.
description.platinum: All status problems are healed upon switching out.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: All status problems heal when it switches out.
description.black-white: All status problems heal when it switches out.

description.x-y: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

description.sword-shield: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
